newsitem.title: CHINA: China PICC's Property profits to $74.46 mln in '96.
newsitem.headline: China PICC's Property profits to $74.46 mln in '96.

text.p: The People's Insurance Company of China (PICC) earned 618 million yuan ($74.46 million) in after-tax profits from its property insurance business in 1996, the Financial News said on Thursday.
PICC Property, one of PICC's three subsidiaries, reported 35 billion yuan in premium business last year, and it paid 22.1 billion yuan in compensation, the newspaper said.
It was the largest property insurance company in China and held a 70 percent market share, it said.
As a business-oriented insurer, it would emphasise its business in big cities and developed areas, it quoted company president Sun Xiyue as saying.
